8 namespace move3d{
9 namespace Tools {
10 
11 std::string getPath(const std::string &url )
12 {
13  typedef const boost::iterator_range<std::string::iterator> StringRange;
14  boost::filesystem::path path;
15  std::string lurl(url),packstr("package://");
16 
17  boost::iterator_range<std::string::iterator> range =
18  boost::algorithm::ifind_first(StringRange(lurl.begin(),lurl.end()),
19  StringRange(packstr.begin(),packstr.end()));
20  if (range)
21  {
22  const std::string chopped_url(range.end(),lurl.end());
23  std::string package_name = chopped_url.substr(0,chopped_url.find_first_of('/'));
24  std::string file_name = chopped_url.substr(chopped_url.find_first_of('/')+1,-1);
25  path = ros::package::getPath(package_name);
26  if(path.empty()){
27  ROS_WARN("package not found for url %s",url.c_str());
28  }
29  path = path / file_name;
30  }
31  else
32  {
33  path = lurl;
34  }
35  return path.string();
36 }
37 
38 }
39 }
move3d::Tools::getPath
std::string getPath(const std::string &url)
getPath can take package:// or absolute URL and return absolute path
